original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar did not take these things away with him when he took the king of Judah away as prisoner. He took away Jehoiakim's son, King Jeconiah of Judah, as well as the important people of Judah and Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이것은 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살이 유다의 왕 여호야김의 아들 여고니야와 유다와 예루살렘 모든 귀인을 예루살렘에서 바벨론으로 사로잡아 옮길 때에 가져가지 아니하였던 것이라

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar did not take these things away
when he took the king of Judah away as prisoner
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 유다 왕을 포로로 데려갔을 때

sentences.original_text: as well as the important people of Judah
